trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_SEQ_00<tab>Maru is keeping his distance from a nearby crate.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_00<tab>Use the Daemir Demolishers on the mudstone mound in the Shroud of the Samgha.
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_01<tab>Obtain the hunk of Ksiroda mudstone.
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the hunk of Ksiroda mudstone to Maru.

TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_000<tab>I've been meanin' to ask you this for some time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but truth be told, I was nervous. Thought it might be too dangerous...

TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_001<tab>But then Kancana told me that your adventures've tossed you into the maw of death an' back again. I figure handlin' some explosives is child's play compared to that...right?

TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_002<tab>...Well, you're still here, so I'll take that as a sign of tacit agreement. We need someone to break up the mudstone around Ksiroda an' bring back a piece. The alchemists keep tellin' me this is the best way, but...just mind your fingers, alright?
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_010<tab>There you are─an' with fingers an' toes still attached! I take it that means the alchemists were right after all.
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_011<tab>Good, good─these'll do it. Mixin' mudstone into water makes a paste that keeps the skin safer from sun an' wind than just about anythin'.

TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_012<tab>You might not think it to look at 'em, but hippos have a delicate hide. If you don't keep it nice and moist, it'll crack like so much mud on a hot day. We're really in your debt this time.

TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_013<tab>Sure, maybe you could've just broken up the stone with a hammer an' chisel...but now I don't gotta worry about someone accidentally settin' those demolishers alight an' blowin' us all into the next life, neither.
